Detailed Description

Strategy to define workstealing selection of nodes.

Disable SSI

virtual bool WS::Strategy::do_local_steal ( Core::Thread *&  victim_thread,
Core::Thread *&  thief_thread,
const Core::ProcessorId &  thief_processor,
Core::ProcessorId &  victim_processor 
) [virtual]

This is the entry point from incomming request to steal local processors The selection of the victim processor is return by select_victim().

bool WS::Strategy::do_steal ( Core::Thread *&  victim_thread,
Core::Thread *&  thief_thread,
const Core::ProcessorId &  thief_processor,
Core::ProcessorId &  victim_processor 
) [virtual]

This is a metaobject for the community/steal invocation Current implementation capture request from idle processor and send message over other processes. The selection of the victim process is return by select_process().

Implements Core::StealAlgorithm.

Reimplemented in WS::CRSStrategy, and WS::LeaderOfClusterStrategy.
